WorkItem.Description:

WorkItem.Summary: Optimize crashes everytime on my mage

Comments.Message:
I have tried various optimize options and 10X mode. 
Optimize works on other toons
I have reloaded RAWR

Looks like this is a very old save file that you haven't used in a while and still has available items stored in an old format so it didn't go through conversion, I'll see if I can easily add it in, otherwise I'd suggest creating it from scratch.
